Package com.varmateo.yawg.util

General utility classes.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FileUtils.ConsumerWithIOException<T>
    Similar to a java.util.function.Consumer but throws IOException.
    FileUtils.FunctionWithIOException<T,R>  
    FileUtils.SupplierWithIOException<T>  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FileUtils
    Utility functions for managing files and directories.
    GlobMatcher
    A predicate for checking if a path matches a given collection of glob patterns.
    GlobMatcher.Builder
    A builder of GlobMatcher instances.
    OnDirBakeResults  
    PageBakeResults  
    Results  
    SimpleList<T>
    Simple list intended for use in deserialization.
    SimpleMap
    Wrapper for an unmodifiable map with utility methods for retrieving values.
    SiteBakeResults  
    Trys
    Utility functions related with io.vavr.control.Try.
    YamlParser
    A simple YAML parser.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    SimpleListException  
    SimpleMapException
